alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 22 at 2:15PM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with the highest amounts near Meeteetse. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Cody Foothills. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times with visibility around a tenth of mile in snow and blowing snow. Roads are expected to become mainly wet during the afternoon Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Windy conditions, along with wet snow and cold temperatures, could be harmful to young livestock.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
